DataElement.preferredName: Notification Reuse Template Study Activity Status Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at the global library level that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. EXAMPLE(S): An alert sent to a study PI that the study has reached 75% of target subject accrual. The date (and time) on which the status is assigned to the activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Notification Reuse Template Study Activity Status Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
